action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: I am starting with a common five-letter word that includes a variety of vowels and consonants.
guess: audio

attempts = 1
target_word = offer
guess = audio
guess_feedback = a<red> u<red> d<red> i<red> o<yellow>

guess_feedback: a<red> u<red> d<red> i<red> o<yellow>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "o" is in the word but in the wrong position. I will try a new word that includes "o" in a different position and excludes the letters "a", "u", "d", and "i".
guess: corny

attempts = 2
target_word = offer
guess = corny
guess_feedback = c<red> o<yellow> r<yellow> n<red> y<red>

guess_feedback: c<red> o<yellow> r<yellow> n<red> y<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters "o" and "r" are in the word but in the wrong positions. I will try a new word that includes "o" and "r" in different positions and excludes the letters "c", "n", and "y".
guess: roast

attempts = 3
target_word = offer
guess = roast
guess_feedback = r<yellow> o<yellow> a<red> s<red> t<red>

guess_feedback: r<yellow> o<yellow> a<red> s<red> t<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters "r" and "o" are in the word but in the wrong positions. I will try a new word that includes "r" and "o" in different positions and excludes the letters "a", "s", and "t".
guess: robin

attempts = 4
target_word = offer
guess = robin
guess_feedback = r<yellow> o<yellow> b<red> i<red> n<red>

guess_feedback: r<yellow> o<yellow> b<red> i<red> n<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters "r" and "o" are in the word but in the wrong positions. I will try a new word that includes "r" and "o" in different positions and excludes the letters "b", "i", and "n".
guess: rogue

attempts = 5
target_word = offer
guess = rogue
guess_feedback = r<yellow> o<yellow> g<red> u<red> e<yellow>

guess_feedback: r<yellow> o<yellow> g<red> u<red> e<yellow>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters "r", "o", and "e" are in the word but in the wrong positions. I will try a new word that includes "r", "o", and "e" in different positions and excludes the letters "g" and "u".
guess: oreos
Guesser Error: NOT_VALID_WORD_FOR_GAME while parsing Player 1's (model: Mistral-Small-24B-Instruct-2501) response

Your guess is not a valid word for this game. Please try again.

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: I will try a new word that includes "r", "o", and "e" in different positions and excludes the letters "g" and "u".
guess: rose

Guess does not conform to the format rules
Error: The length of the guessed word is not 5.
game_result = ABORT

guess_explanation: I am starting with a common five-letter word that includes a variety of vowels and consonants.
The letter "o" is in the word but in the wrong position. I will try a new word that includes "o" in a different position and excludes the letters "a", "u", "d", and "i".
The letters "o" and "r" are in the word but in the wrong positions. I will try a new word that includes "o" and "r" in different positions and excludes the letters "c", "n", and "y".
The letters "r" and "o" are in the word but in the wrong positions. I will try a new word that includes "r" and "o" in different positions and excludes the letters "a", "s", and "t".
The letters "r" and "o" are in the word but in the wrong positions. I will try a new word that includes "r" and "o" in different positions and excludes the letters "b", "i", and "n".
